prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a sturdy body and bright orange spikes.
I want a Pokemon that features a blue and red color scheme with a unique shape.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a boulder but has distinct eyes and claws.
Make a Pokemon with a rugged appearance that embodies strength and resilience.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into rocky environments with its dark blue color.
Design a Pokemon that has a shell-like body and vibrant red accents.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a rock monster with bright orange details.
